channel.title: Long overdue updates to activitypub.rocks
channel.description:
Well what can I say, it's kind of embarrassing it's taken so long, but [activitypub.rocks has been updated](https://activitypub.rocks/news/overdue-site-updates.html) with long-requested (and long-overdue) changes... *especially* trying to recognize resources put forward by this very community.
Might be more to do, but at least the most critical ones are done I think. Thanks to @rhiaro for helping identify a list of the core tasks to do.
Hopefully we'll do better going forward. Anyway, there you go!
